ProcessTemplates.Name: Adobe Commerce / Magento Order to Salesforce
ProcessTemplates.Description: This process will retrieve sales orders from Adobe Commerce (Magento). It will perform the necessary mapping to Salesforce sales order format. Then it will transfer the mapped sales orders to Salesforce.
